# Charles D. Stewart

|death_date          =
|office1             = Member of the Florida House of Representatives from Okaloosa County

Charles D. Stewart (February 17, 1919 â€“ August 15, 1986) was an American politician. He served as a Democratic member of the Florida House of Representatives.
In 1955, Stewart was elected to the Florida House of Representatives, succeeding Ferrin C. Campbell. In 1961, he was succeeded by Jack C. Nichols.
